data.eml:eml: Pempheris ufuagari sp. nov., a new species in the genus Pempheris (Perciformes, Pempheridae) from the oceanic islands of Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Koeda, Keita, Yoshino, Tetsuo, Tachihara, Katsunori (2013): Pempheris ufuagari sp. nov., a new species in the genus Pempheris (Perciformes, Pempheridae) from the oceanic islands of Japan. Zootaxa 3609 (2): 231-238, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3609.2.9
